Description.text: A simple chrome extension that displays weather and 7-day forecast information. Boasting a beautifully clean user interface, Weatherloo uses the UW Weather Station and OpenWeatherMap to satisfy your weather needs.

WATisRain is an Android app to help you navigate the buildings of the University of Waterloo without going outside (ie, by going through the various tunnels between buildings). This may prove to be useful when it's raining outside, or if it's freezing cold.
Weatherloo fetches and displays data from the University of Waterloo Weather Station (weather.uwaterloo.ca).
